name: devil fruit amigurumi
notes:
inspired from one piece, here is a crochet devil fruit also known as gomu gomu no mi.  consume this fruit and you will attain stretchy powers, but it comes with a cost! you lose your ability to swim as the ocean tries to claim you back.  a most dire threat for any pirate sailing the blue sea in search of the one piece treasure! 

the features of this devil fruit crochet pattern includes a purple sphere, a green stem, and swirls of textural s's.  hope you enjoy making it! 

**approximate size:**
3.5 inch wide by 4 inch tall
